challenges.title: Two Sum
challenges.description: Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers such that they add up to target.

challenges.title: Linked List Cycle
challenges.description: Given head, the head of a linked list, determine if the linked list has a cycle in it.

challenges.title: Design a Rate Limiter
challenges.description: Design a rate limiter that prevents a user from making too many API requests within a certain time frame.
